Key Match Events: Robbie Brady fired the winner in the 88th minute after Liam Scales cancelled out Joel Pohjanpalo's opener in Finland on Thursday.
Vangelis Pavlidis hit his second goal of the game in the 94th minute to continue the Greeks' perfect start to the campaign against England at Wembley on Thursday.
Pre-Game Insights: The Republic of Ireland travel to group leaders Greece for the latest fixture in their UEFA Nations League campaign this weekend.
